refnamediv.refpurpose: Test if the DOM implementation implements a specific feature

refentry.refsect1:
&reftitle.description;
public boolDOMImplementation::hasFeature stringfeature stringversion
Test if the DOM implementation implements a specific feature.
You can find a list of all features in the Conformance section of the DOM specification.

&reftitle.parameters;
feature
The feature to test.
version
The version number of the feature to test. In level 2, this can be either 2.0 or 1.0.
